mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TEAM_FEE( TEAM_FEE_ID, TEAM_FEE_PRICE, TEAM_FEE_PAY_START_AT, TEAM_FEE_PAY_END_AT, TEAM_ID, TEAM_FEE_DESC )VALUES ( TEAM_FEE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{team_fee_price}, TO_DATE(#{team_fee_pay_start_at}, 'YYYY-MM'), TO_DATE(#{team_fee_pay_end_at}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{team_id},#{team_fee_desc} )

INSERT INTO TEAM_MEMBER_FEE_PAY( TEAM_MEMBER_FEE_PAY_ID, TEAM_MEMBER_FEE_PAY_PRICE, TEAM_MEMBER_FEE_PAY_AT, TEAM_FEE_ID, TEAM_MEMBER_ID ) VALUES( TEAM_MEMBER_FEE_PAY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{team_fee_price},sysdate,#{team_fee_id},#{team_member_id} )
mapper.select: SELECT RNUM, TEAM_ID, TRANSACTION_TYPE, TRANSACTION_DATE, DESCRIPTION, FIELD_NAME, STADIUM_NAME, MATCH_DATE, START_TIME, END_TIME, MATCH_INWON, INCOME_AMOUNT, EXPENSE_AMOUNT, NET_AMOUNT, MATCH_STATUS, TEAM_FEE_ID FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, DATA.* FROM ( SELECT TEAM_ID, TRANSACTION_TYPE, TO_CHAR(TRANSACTION_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS TRANSACTION_DATE, DESCRIPTION, FIELD_NAME, STADIUM_NAME, MATCH_DATE, START_TIME, END_TIME, MATCH_INWON, INCOME_AMOUNT, EXPENSE_AMOUNT, NET_AMOUNT, MATCH_STATUS, TEAM_FEE_ID FROM TEAM_FINANCIAL_LEDGER_VIEW ORDER BY TRANSACTION_DATE DESC ) DATA WHERE ROWNUM <=#{end} ) WHERE RNUM >= #{start} AND TEAM_ID = #{team_id}

SELECT TEAM_FEE_ID, TEAM_FEE_PRICE, TO_CHAR(TEAM_FEE_PAY_START_AT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "TEAM_FEE_PAY_START_AT", TO_CHAR(TEAM_FEE_PAY_END_AT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "TEAM_FEE_PAY_END_AT", TEAM_ID, TEAM_FEE_DESC FROM TEAM_FEE WHERE TEAM_ID = #{team_id}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM TEAM_FINANCIAL_LEDGER_VIEW WHERE TEAM_ID =#{team_id}

SELECT TEAM_MEMBER_FEE_PAY_ID ,TEAM_MEMBER_FEE_PAY_PRICE ,TO_CHAR(TEAM_MEMBER_FEE_PAY_AT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "TEAM_MEMBER_FEE_PAY_AT" ,TEAM_FEE_ID ,TEAM_MEMBER_ID ,USER_NICK_NAME ,TEAM_ID FROM TEAM_MEMBER_FEE_PAY_VIEW WHERE TEAM_FEE_ID =#{team_fee_id}
